generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and crosswalks, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and pedestrian areas.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial storefronts and residential structures.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are mounted on poles at intersections.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including directional and regulatory signs.
- vegetation: Trees are present along the sidewalks and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Pedestrians can be seen walking on sidewalks and crossing the street.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the street and driving on the road.
- bicycle: Bicycles are parked on the sidewalk near the right side of the road.
